levelList.name: Blind Obsession

[EndSkill] Apply 2 Damage Up this turn and next turn to 4 allies with the least SP

[OnSucceedAttack] Heal self by 4~8% of damage dealt

levelList.name: Wingbeat
levelList.desc: If this Skill's healing exceeds this unit's max HP, redirect the excess healing to 1 ally with the least HP percentage instead

levelList.name: Wingbeat
levelList.desc:
[CantIdentify]
Targets the unit with the least Core HP
[BeforeAttack] Deal 5% HP damage to at most 5 random other allies
- Heal HP on self equal to the damage dealt to allies.
- If this unit dealt damage to an ally, gain 2 [Enhancement] this turn, and gain 2 [Agility] next turn.
(Once per turn. The 'dealt damage' includes damage dealt to Shield HP. This effect can kill allies.)

coindescs.desc: [OnSucceedAttackTail] Heal self by 10% of damage dealt

levelList.name: Wingbeat
levelList.desc:
[CantIdentify]
Targets the unit with the least Core HP
<style="highlight">[BeforeAttack] Gain (# of highest Reson. -2) Atk Weight (max 1)</style>
[BeforeAttack] Deal 5% HP damage to at most 5 random other allies
- Heal HP on self equal to the damage dealt to allies.
- If this unit dealt damage to an ally, gain 2 [Enhancement] this turn, and gain 2 [Agility] next turn.
(Once per turn. The 'dealt damage' includes damage dealt to Shield HP. This effect can kill allies.)
<style="highlight">[EndSkill] If this Skill's healing exceeds this unit's max HP, gain (excess heal/max HP) x 10 [AttackUp] next turn. (max 3 per turn)</style>

coindescs.desc: [OnSucceedAttackTail] Heal self by <style="highlight">15</style>% of damage dealt

levelList.name: Wingbeat

[CantIdentify]
Targets the unit with the least Core HP

levelList.name: Bygone Days
levelList.desc:
[BeforeAttack] At 4+ highest Reson., gain +1 Atk Weight
[EndSkill] Heal 2 allies with the lowest HP percentages by (5 + (sum of [Sinking] Potency and Count on the main target)/3)% HP (max 15%)

levelList.name: Bygone Days
levelList.desc:
[BeforeAttack] At 4+ highest Reson., gain +1 Atk Weight
<style="highlight">- If the said Reson. was a Gloom Reson., gain +1 Atk Weight</style>
[EndSkill] Heal 2 allies with the lowest HP percentages by (<style="highlight">10</style> + (sum of [Sinking] Potency and Count on the main target)/3)% HP (max 15%)

levelList.name: Bygone Days
levelList.desc:
[BeforeAttack] At 4+ highest Reson., gain +1 Atk Weight
- If the said Reson. was a Gloom Reson., gain +1 Atk Weight
[EndSkill] Heal 2 allies with the lowest HP percentages by (10 + (sum of [Sinking] Potency and Count on the main target)/3)% HP (max <style="highlight">20</style>%)
<style="highlight">- If the highest Reson. was a 4+ Gloom Reson., heal 10% more of the max HP</style>

levelList.name: Bygone Days
levelList.desc:
[CantIdentify]
Prioritizes targets with the most [Sinking]
[BeforeAttack] Lose HP by 10% of Max HP (does not get Staggered due to this effect)
[EndSkill] Heal 3 other allies with the lowest HP percentages by (5 + (sum of [Sinking] Potency and Count on the main target)/3)% HP (max 10%)
- At 4+ highest Reson., heal 1 additional ally

levelList.name: Bygone Days

levelList.desc:

Prioritizes targets with the most [Sinking]
